name: DocuSign
description: DocuSign, Inc. is the market leader and global standard for electronic signature. DocuSign provides the world’s largest and fastest growing electronic signature platform, empowering businesses to complete transactions online quickly and securely while improving compliance and reducing costs.

apis.name: DocuSign
apis.description: DocuSign Enterprise helps companies securely collect information, automate data workflows, and sign everything, everywhere. With scalable management and comprehensive security and administrative controls, companies will find everything needed to automate manual, paper-based processes and accelerate transaction cycle times across the entire organization.
